CustomField.formula: IF ((ISPICKVAL(APT_Method_of_Payment__c, "Charge Account") || ISPICKVAL(APT_Method_of_Payment__c, "Charge Account + Sub Account")), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apt_CreditAssessment?proposalId="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/APT_IntiateCreditCheck", "IntiateCreditCheck"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Initiate Credit Assesment
